validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.acceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.demoHint: Demo login - credentials are pre-filled for convenience

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeDescription: This is a customizable admin portal template built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Syncfusion components. Use the Theme Editor to customize colors, typography, and more.

themeSettings.title: Theme Settings
themeSettings.subtitle: Design your theme
themeSettings.baseColorDesc: Choose your brand color - shades generate automatically
themeSettings.manualTip: Tip: In manual mode, each shade is independent. Changes won't cascade to components.

typography.title: Typography Settings
typography.description: Configure font families, sizes, weights, and spacing.

layout.title: Layout Settings
layout.description: Configure spacing, border radius, shadows, and dimensions.

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: Configure global animation behavior for all components.

components.title: Component Styles
components.editHint: Click on a component to edit its styles.

products.title: Products
products.noProductsInCategory: There are no products in the {{p1}} category.

table.groupDropHint: Drag a column header here to group by that column

components.title: Components Showcase
components.nativeDescription: HTML/CSS native components using CSS variables for theming. Zero Syncfusion dependencies.
components.syncfusionDescription: Premium Syncfusion components with theme-aware styling and advanced features.

inputs.helperText: This helper text provides additional context.
inputs.fullWidthPlaceholder: This input stretches to fill available width
inputs.interactivePlaceholder: Start typing to see live value...

dataGrid.description: The DataGrid component is loaded on a separate page for better performance. Click below to view the full demo.

gridShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Explore all Syncfusion DataGrid features with live examples
gridShowcase.nativeDescription: Explore all native HTML table features with live examples

sections.basicGridDesc: Simple data table with column sorting and inline filtering. Click any column header to sort; type in the filter row to narrow results.
sections.groupingDesc: Group rows by one or more columns. Drag column headers to the drop area to add groups. Click group headers to collapse or expand.
sections.editingDesc: Edit rows using Inline, Dialog, or Batch mode. Use the command column buttons to edit, delete, save, or cancel changes.
sections.selectionDesc: Select rows using Single click, Multiple (Ctrl/Shift + click), or Checkbox mode. The selected count updates in real time.
sections.aggregatesDesc: Footer summaries showing Sum, Average, Count, Min, and Max computed across all rows for numeric columns.
sections.paginationDesc: Client-side pagination with configurable page sizes. Use the page size dropdown and navigation buttons to browse data.
sections.alertManagementDesc: SIEM-style alert management grid with severity badges, SLA tracking, and checkbox selection.

buttonShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Button component with all variants, sizes, and states.
buttonShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Button component with all variants, sizes, and states.

sections.statesDesc: Disabled, loading, and other interactive states.
sections.interactiveDesc: Click handlers and toggle state demonstrations.
sections.cssButtonsDesc: Native HTML buttons styled with CSS utility classes.
sections.fullWidthDesc: Buttons that expand to fill the entire container width.

inputShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Input component with all types and states.
inputShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Input component with all types and states.

sections.basicDesc: Standard text, email, and password input types.
sections.statesDesc: Disabled, error, and helper text states.
sections.advancedDesc: Numeric, masked, and specialized input types.
sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled input with live value display.

selectShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Select component with all features.
selectShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Select/Dropdown component with all features.

sections.statesDesc: Disabled, error, and helper text states.
sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled select with live value display.

selectShowcase.basicHelper: Choose one of the available options
selectShowcase.placeholderHelper: A custom placeholder is shown when no value is selected
selectShowcase.manyOptionsHelper: A select with many options to scroll through
selectShowcase.disabledHelper: This select is disabled and cannot be changed
selectShowcase.helperTextHelper: Helper text provides additional context to the user
selectShowcase.comboBoxHelper: Type to filter or select from the list

datepickerShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native DatePicker component.
datepickerShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of Syncfusion calendar and date picking components.

sections.statesDesc: Disabled, min/max date constraints, and error states.
sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled date picker with live value display.
sections.dateTimePickerDesc: Combined date and time selection in a single component.

labels.withHelperText: Choose a date for your appointment
labels.minMaxHelper: Only dates within the next 30 days
labels.dateRangeHelper: Select a start and end date

dialogShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Dialog/Modal component.
dialogShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Dialog and Tooltip components.

sections.basicDesc: Simple open/close dialog with a trigger button.
sections.customDesc: Dialog with rich custom body content including a form.

dialogShowcase.basicDialogContent: This is a basic dialog component. Click the close button or press ESC to dismiss.
dialogShowcase.confirmDialogContent: Are you sure you want to proceed? This operation cannot be undone.
dialogShowcase.dangerDialogContent: This will permanently delete the selected item. This action cannot be reversed.
dialogShowcase.modalDialogContent: This is a modal dialog. The overlay blocks interaction with the page behind it. Click outside or press ESC to close.
dialogShowcase.nonModalDialogContent: This dialog does not block page interaction. Clicking outside will not close it.

alertShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Alert component with all variants and features.
alertShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Message/Alert component with all variants.

sections.variantsDesc: Success, warning, error, and info alert styles.
sections.featuresDesc: Dismissible, no icon, and title options.
sections.dismissibleDesc: Alerts that can be closed by the user.

alertShowcase.dismissibleWithTitleMessage: This alert has a title and can be dismissed by clicking the close button.
alertShowcase.noIconMessage: This alert displays without an icon for a cleaner look.
alertShowcase.withChildrenMessage: Alerts can contain additional structured content such as lists or links.
alertShowcase.withChildrenDetail: Check the documentation for more details on alert customization options.
alertShowcase.longContentMessage: This alert demonstrates how longer content is handled. It provides additional context about an operation that completed, including details the user may find helpful for their next steps.
alertShowcase.sfDismissibleFilled: This filled alert can be dismissed by clicking the close icon.
alertShowcase.sfDismissibleOutlined: This outlined alert can be dismissed by clicking the close icon.
alertShowcase.sfDismissibleText: This text alert can be dismissed by clicking the close icon.

checkboxShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Checkbox component with all states and features.
checkboxShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion CheckBox component with all variants and states.

sections.withLabelDesc: Checkboxes with labels, descriptions, and helper text.
sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled checkbox group with state display.

labels.errorMessage: You must accept the terms to continue.
labels.helperText: We will send you weekly updates.
labels.descriptionText: Switch the application to a dark color scheme.
labels.withRequired: I agree to the privacy policy
labels.receiveEmailsHelper: Get notified about new features and updates.
labels.receiveSmsHelper: Get urgent notifications via text message.

toastShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Toast/notification component.
toastShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Toast component with all variants and configurations.

sections.variantsDesc: Success, warning, error, and info toast styles.
sections.interactiveDesc: Trigger toasts with different configurations to see behavior in action.
sections.customContentDesc: Click to trigger a toast with custom title and message.
sections.stackingDesc: Rapidly trigger multiple toasts to see stacking behavior.
sections.customMessage: This is a toast with a custom title and message.
sections.autoDismissMessage: This toast will disappear in 5 seconds.

toggleShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Toggle/Switch component.
toggleShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Switch component with all variants and states.

sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled toggle with live state display.

labels.settingsPanelDesc: Multiple toggles in a settings panel layout.

toolbarShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Toolbar component with buttons, separators, and interactive state tracking.
toolbarShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Toolbar component with all item types and configurations.

sections.basicDesc: Toolbar with text-and-icon action buttons separated into logical groups.
sections.variantsDesc: Icon-only, text-only, and mixed toolbar configurations.
sections.interactiveDesc: Click any toolbar button to track the active selection.
sections.overflowModesDesc: Different overflow behaviors when toolbar items exceed available width.

menuShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Menu/Dropdown component.
menuShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Menu component with all variants and nested items.

sections.basicDesc: Standard horizontal menu bar with dropdown items and separators. Hover or click to open sub-menus.
sections.nestedDesc: Multi-level hierarchical menus with nested sub-items. Hover over items with chevrons to reveal deeper levels.
sections.interactiveDesc: Menu with click handlers that track the last selected item. Demonstrates onClick callbacks on leaf items.

accordionShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Accordion/Collapsible component.
accordionShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Accordion component with all expand modes and configurations.

sections.basicDesc: Single panel expand/collapse with default expanded state.
sections.multipleDesc: Multiple expandable panels with single-expand and multi-expand modes.
sections.interactiveDesc: Controlled accordion with live state tracking.

basic.gettingStartedContent: Click on any accordion header to expand or collapse its content panel. The chevron icon rotates to indicate the current state.
basic.featuresContent: The accordion supports smooth CSS transitions, keyboard navigation, and semantic HTML using button elements for accessibility.
basic.themingContent: All colors and styles are driven by CSS variables and Tailwind utility classes, making it easy to match your application theme.

multiple.singleModeDesc: Only one panel can be open at a time. Opening a new panel closes the previous one.
multiple.multiModeDesc: Multiple panels can be open simultaneously using the allowMultiple prop.
multiple.projectsContent: Manage and track your active projects with status updates and deadlines.
multiple.tasksContent: Organize tasks by priority, assignee, and due date across all projects.
multiple.teamContent: View team member roles, availability, and current assignments.
multiple.reportsContent: Generate and export reports on project progress, budgets, and team performance.

interactive.faqHeader1: How do I create a new project?
interactive.faqContent1: Navigate to the Projects page and click the New Project button. Fill in the required fields and submit the form.
interactive.faqContent2: Yes, go to Team Settings and use the Invite feature. External collaborators will receive an email invitation.
interactive.faqContent3: Billing is based on the number of active team members and the features included in your subscription plan.
interactive.faqHeader4: Where can I find the API documentation?
interactive.faqContent4: API documentation is available in the Developer section of your dashboard under Settings, Integrations, API Docs.

breadcrumbShowcase.nativeDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the native Breadcrumb navigation component.
breadcrumbShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Comprehensive showcase of the Syncfusion Breadcrumb component with all separator styles and navigation features.

sections.basicDesc: Simple breadcrumb navigation trails with different depths.
sections.customDesc: Breadcrumbs with custom separator characters and leading icons.
sections.interactiveDesc: Click breadcrumb items to see the navigation target.

breadcrumbShowcase.noneNavigated: Click a breadcrumb item to navigate

tabsShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency tab component with keyboard navigation

timelineShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency timeline component with vertical and horizontal layouts

tagShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency tag/chip component with variants and removable support

chipShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency chip component with variants, icons, and removable support
chipShowcase.syncfusionDescription: Syncfusion-styled chip component with variants and sizes

badgeShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency badge component with dot, count, and text modes

alertBadgeShowcase.title: Alert Badge
alertBadgeShowcase.description: Themed badge component for security alerts, severity levels, SLA status, and risk scores

avatarShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency avatar with image, initials, and status indicator

cardShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency card component with header, body, and footer

progressBarShowcase.nativeDescription: Zero-dependency progress bar with variants and animation

themeToggleShowcase.nativeDescription: Animated light/dark mode toggle with sun/moon iconography

sections.variantsDesc: Available toggle sizes: small, medium, and large.
sections.interactiveDesc: Connected to the real theme store - toggles actual light/dark mode.

cards.defaultDesc: A basic card with background and border styling.
cards.elevatedDesc: This card has a subtle shadow for elevation.
cards.withHeaderDesc: This card has a distinct header section.
cards.withFooterDesc: This card includes a footer with action links.
cards.fullDesc: Card with header, content, and footer sections.
cards.syncfusionBasicDesc: Syncfusion e-card with header and content.
cards.fullContentDescription: This card demonstrates all sub-element classes working together: header with title and subtitle, padded content area, and a footer with action links.
cards.syncfusionBasicContent: A basic Syncfusion card component with themed header, subtitle, and content area.
cards.syncfusionActionsContent: This Syncfusion card includes action buttons in the footer area.
cards.syncfusionHorizontalContent: A horizontal Syncfusion card layout that stacks header and content side by side. All colors respond to the card theme editor settings.
cards.nativeFullContentDescription: Native HTML card with header, content, and footer sections. All colors are driven by CSS variables from the theme editor. Zero JavaScript dependencies.

syncfusionToasts.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

components.tabContent1: This is the content for Tab 1. Tabs help organize content.
components.tabContent2: This is the content for Tab 2. Each tab can have unique content.
components.tabContent3: This is the content for Tab 3. Switch between tabs to navigate.
components.dialogContent: This is a basic dialog component. Dialogs are used to show information or gather input from users.
components.confirmDialogContent: Are you sure you want to proceed with this action? This operation cannot be undone.
components.nativeDialogContent: This is a native HTML dialog component using the <dialog> element. It provides built-in accessibility and modal behavior.

flexBox.description: Native CSS Flexbox container with themed styling. Customize via Theme Editor > Components > FlexBox.
flexBox.syncfusionDescription: Syncfusion SplitterComponent provides resizable flex-like panes. Already used in this page's layout.

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.warningMessage: Please review your changes before proceeding.
alerts.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again later.
alerts.infoMessage: This is an informational message for the user.
alerts.dismissibleMessage: This alert can be dismissed by clicking the close button.
alerts.nativeSuccessMessage: Your changes have been saved successfully.
alerts.nativeWarningMessage: Your session will expire in 5 minutes.
alerts.nativeErrorMessage: Failed to load data. Please try again.
alerts.nativeInfoMessage: A new version is available. Update to get the latest features.
alerts.nativeDismissibleMessage: This alert can be dismissed by clicking the close button.

nativeAccordion.whatIsContent: Accordions are useful for organizing content into collapsible sections. They save screen space while keeping content accessible.
nativeAccordion.howToUseContent: Click on any accordion header to expand or collapse its content. Only one section can be open at a time by default.
nativeAccordion.customizationContent: Accordions can be customized with different expand modes, icons, and animations to match your application's design.

pwa.installDescription: Install this app for quick access and offline use

page.title: Syncfusion Forms Showcase
page.description: Demonstrates React Hook Form + Zod integration with Syncfusion components. Shows validation on blur, cross-field validation, and various input types.

page.title: Native Forms Showcase
page.description: Demonstrates React Hook Form + Zod integration with native HTML components. Zero Syncfusion dependencies for optimal bundle size.

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: These forms use native HTML inputs with zero Syncfusion dependencies. Ideal for login pages, public-facing forms, and performance-critical scenarios.

native.userNotFound: No user found matching that email address.

login.title: Login Form
login.description: Simple login form with email, password, and remember me checkbox. Uses native HTML inputs for minimal bundle size.

newsletter.title: Newsletter Form
newsletter.description: Minimal inline form for newsletter subscription. Single email field with horizontal layout.

order.title: Order Form
order.description: Complex form with dynamic item rows, user/product dropdowns from API, and order creation via MockServer.

common.noSubmissionYet: No form submission yet. Fill out the form and submit to see the results.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.description: Basic form with name, email, phone (optional), and message fields. Demonstrates required field validation and email format validation.
contact.name: Name

registration.title: Registration Form
registration.description: Form with cross-field validation. Demonstrates password confirmation matching and required checkbox for terms acceptance.
registration.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions

product.title: Product Form
product.description: Form with select dropdown and number inputs. Demonstrates CRUD operations against the MockServer API.
product.editDescription: Modify the product details and submit to update.

search.title: Product Search
search.description: Search products via the MockServer API. Enter a search query and optionally filter by category. Results are displayed in a DataGrid.
search.noResultsHint: Try adjusting your search query or category filter.

userCreation.title: User Creation
userCreation.description: Submit the contact form to create a new user via the MockServer API. The name field is split into first and last name automatically.
userCreation.errorCreating: Failed to create user. Please try again.

user.title: User Form
user.description: Create a new user via the MockServer Users API. All fields except phone are required.
user.editDescription: Modify the user details and submit to update.

gridShowcase.basicDescription: Simple data grid with sorting, filtering, and pagination enabled. Click column headers to sort, use the filter row to narrow results.
gridShowcase.groupingDescription: Grid with group drop area. Drag column headers to the drop zone to group data. Pre-grouped by Department.
gridShowcase.editingDescription: Click Edit on any row to modify values inline. Use Save to persist or Cancel to discard changes.
gridShowcase.selectionDescription: Multi-row selection using checkboxes. Select individual rows or use the header checkbox to select all.
gridShowcase.columnFeaturesDescription: Resize columns by dragging borders, reorder by dragging headers. First column is frozen. Use the Column Chooser to toggle visibility.
gridShowcase.aggregatesDescription: Footer row showing Sum, Average, and Count aggregates for order data columns.
gridShowcase.toolbarDescription: Toolbar with search, print, and export buttons. Right-click rows for context menu options.
gridShowcase.detailRowDescription: Click the expand icon on any row to reveal additional employee details in an expandable panel.
gridShowcase.dragDropDescription: Drag rows by the handle to reorder them within the grid.
gridShowcase.paginationDescription: Client-side pagination with configurable page sizes. Use the page size dropdown and navigation buttons to browse data.
gridShowcase.virtualizationDescription: Renders 1,000 rows efficiently using row virtualization. Only visible rows are rendered in the DOM for optimal performance.
gridShowcase.alertManagementDesc: SIEM-style alert management grid with severity badges, SLA tracking, checkbox selection, and searchable toolbar.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to perform this action.
errors.featureNotAvailable: This feature is not available on your current plan.
errors.subscriptionRequired: A subscription is required to access this feature.
errors.validationFailed: Please check your input and try again.
errors.conflict: This action conflicts with a recent change. Please refresh and try again.
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.badGateway: The server is temporarily unreachable. Please try again shortly.
errors.serverError: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.networkOffline: You appear to be offline. Please check your connection.
errors.requestTimeout: The request took too long. Please try again.
errors.maintenance: The system is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
errors.maintenanceMode: We are performing scheduled maintenance. Please check back soon.
